title: The Confession
creator: Mary Roberts Rinehart
description: LibriVox recording of The Confession, by Mary Roberts Rinehart. Read by Wina Hathaway Mary Roberts Rinehart is claimed to have invented the "Had I but known" mystery genre. When Agnes Blakiston rented the old parsonage at Miss Emily's request she soon came to regret it. Was the house haunted? Did Miss Emily have a secret so terrible she would rather die than reveal it? To find the answers you will need to listen. (Summary by Annise) For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: Librivox;audiobook;fiction;mystery
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text

reviews.reviewbody: Atmospheric, but not a puzzle in the sense of a modern mystery novel, or horrific, in the modern sense.  Enjoyable on its own terms, though.
